short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small, but excellent in searchability, another bookmark.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides another bookmark that is different from the regular bookmarks.

This extension can be used as follows:

- Use it as a bookmark with excellent searchability.
- Use it as a sub-bookmark.
- Use it for bookmarks of specific genres only.

Furthermore, this extension is operated as open-source software (OSS) and does not share any information with external sources. Therefore, you can use it with peace of mind.
